Activate 1 Interact

The save for addiction to succubus kiss is @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Succubus Kiss Addiction|traits:virulent|showDC:owner], and the addiction has the virulent trait.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|showDC:owner]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 +2 item bonus to initiative checks (10 minutes) and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1)]

Stage 2 as stage 1 plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (1 hour)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)]

Stage 3 as stage 2 plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded]{Blindness} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened]{Deafness} (1 hour)

Stage 4 blindness and deafness (1 hour)

Stage 5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious]
